scripts.build: themer -c ./colors.js -t themer-alfred -t themer-chrome -t themer-iterm -t themer-slack -t themer-tmux -t themer-vim -t themer-wallpaper-block-wave --themer-wallpaper-block-wave-size 3840x2160 -t themer-wallpaper-octagon -t themer-wallpaper-triangles -t themer-wallpaper-trianglify -o output
